column3: “I love this strain in RSO form (also called Akorn). It relieved a lot of pain, and helped with abdominal pain and inflammation caused by my crohn's disease. It seemed to take care of my inflammatory arthritis as well. It gives me a fuzzy" feeling that makes the pain go away.”"

“Snow bunny/SnoBud/Akorn whatever the buckz you call it FIRE top ten on my list for my issues with pts.
comparible to GG for me love this shipz dont let the name fool ya winner.Been awile since I've seen this strain.
Deep rich nutty chestnut vanilla flavor's almost immediate relief with anxiety and depression.
Budz were tightly compacted color flew of Miami hurricane color's.
KOBE STRAIN !”

“To date the dankest most crystallized, skunk smelling, 70's bush looking, outlandish nuggets I've ever had the pleasure of consuming. Warning! You need an air tight container, I threw away the package this came in into my home trash, ran some errands, when I returned my entire house smelled like a dispensary! This stuff is no joke and not to be messed with as a novice... Enjoy -”
“Not so tasty, kinda dry.  Very Light Green, and the buds all look like little mountains. Good high-percenter....but the high just doesn't last. Kinda tiring really.”
“Pungent with a nice high”
“Nice relaxing high smoke before I go lay down for the night next thing it's morning”

“Works better than any other strain I have found for cramps and spasms. On the downside the aroma is off the charts. Vacuum tight container is required or the hut will smell like you have a pet skunk.”

“My newest favorite! Uplifting and almost energetic. Focused, but relaxed and mellow.  Perfect Hybrid in my opinion.  I do love the noticeable body buzz that certainly helps with the achy joints and bones.”
“floral flavor with a lovely earthy undertone. buds were nice and frosty. delivery was quick and helped with stress.”
“Great buds, frosty, nice burn. Very relaxing. Would purchase again.”
“Awesome bud, frosty, sweet/skunky. Highly recommend.”
“Although this is a hybrid It has an intense body high indica dominant good for relaxing and sleeping”

“This strain is dope, whether you call it snow bud or akorn. You can tell that it’s almost exactly 50/50 sativa indica. As a person with anxiety I find that it doesn’t make my anxiety worse when smoking it. Doesn’t taste the best but it’s worth it for the high”
“eighth for 20$ and I'm thinking this dispensary value smoke is great to sit back n cheif a couple bowls and has a nice high”
“I found this strain to have an almost coffee-like flavor at a low temp but when I raised the temp just a little bit, it began to taste almost like a “burnt homegrown. Bleh! It’s a strain
column5: that should be vaporized at a very low setting for flavor. I think trying to smoke it in a joint or bowl could be a little harsh.

column1: The mood of this one was great and I felt very happy. But

column3: “This strain seemed to give me an almost dizzy nauseous feeling when I smoked a lot of it. Personally wasn't a huge fan of the high and got slightly paranoid, but some of it was pleasant.”
“I give it 5 stars any day .. Snow bud is loved by 🍁”
“Best strand we've had yet!!”

“This has quickly become one of my all time favorite strains. Sunflower meds here in az has this strain regularly and it is always exceptional. I use this strain like most would have a redbull when I have homework. Uplifting but doesn't make me feel anxious. The flavor is very earthy and woody. It does indeed taste like oak or acorns.”
“love it man haha great for inspiration (:”
“My favorite strain. I get this regularly at sunflower meds here in Phoenix and it I'd grown and cured to perfection. Very earthy flavor with a clear headed hybrid effect.”
“I found this strain to have an almost coffee-like flavor at a low temp but when I raised the temp just a little bit, it began to taste almost like a “burnt homegrown. Bleh! It’s a strain
column5: that should be vaporized at a very low setting for flavor. I think trying to smoke it in a joint or bowl could be a little harsh.

column1: The mood of this one was great and I felt very happy. But

column3: “Aka Akorn. My first review of this strain was for the RSO only(Bloom-PHX is great for strain specific RSO’s). I’ve since had crumble, shatter and flower. The fact I’ve tried all should tell you how much I love this strain. I do prefer the RSO, however, they ALL are miracle workers on my arthritic hips (inflammatory arthritis). I’ve yet to find anything that works as well as this and it seems to help my crohn’s diseas...”
“Find the effects kind of boring but great for collecting crystals”
“This strain seemed to give me an almost dizzy nauseous feeling when I smoked a lot of it. Personally wasn't a huge fan of the high and got slightly paranoid, but some of it was pleasant.”

“This strain is dope, whether you call it snow bud or akorn. You can tell that it’s almost exactly 50/50 sativa indica. As a person with anxiety I find that it doesn’t make my anxiety worse when smoking it. Doesn’t taste the best but it’s worth it for the high”
“Although this is a hybrid It has an intense body high indica dominant good for relaxing and sleeping”
“Awesome bud, frosty, sweet/skunky. Highly recommend.”
“eighth for 20$ and I'm thinking this dispensary value smoke is great to sit back n cheif a couple bowls and has a nice high”
“Good high but fuck the headaches are murder”

“I have two reviews to make.
First to Leaf life the Dispensary, they are second to none. They think of you the patient firs how, they don't sell products that don't do the same. Their price range is lower with a much better product. You should travel to only shop from this Dispensary.
Second this Flower, it was frosty with orange crystals every where. Great for bedtime, or chillin on your game console. (PAIN FREE)”
“Akron was the other name for this.....Very nice strain good relaxing high with pain relief affects and uplifts mood.”
